trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There were no other sightings in Liverpool on or around August 31st 2004
Summary: 3 ufos 4 seconds apart looked like 2 moons & 1 setting sun
divs: sighting detailsi don't smoke in the house so i was standing on back porch doorstep when i cought a glimpse of a bright light to my left. turning to face it i was amazed to see what i can only describe as a circle, looking like the moon without the craters\mountains. this was approx. 1\4 mile away coming over the hill at about 200 feet up, from this distance it looked the size of a large football, it was travelling slowly (helicopter speed, judging by our police helicopter). i kept watching as it moved across in front of me dissapearing behind the house next door. it seemed to be travelling as if it would land several miles away, i thought it could be the isle of angelsey or the irish sea. i imagine the time taken to go out of sight was approx. 4 seconds. it was hard to belive what i had just seen, i just had to assume it was a ufo. i would love to know if other people have seen anything like this, i just wish i had phoned the police or coastguard then i may have heard more about it. i just stood there amazed, excited and perplexed, i kept looking in the direction from which it had come. i could not belive it when approx 4 seconds later i saw another identical object on an identical course come over the hill at exactly the same place. yet again another 4 seconds or so later another same size object came over on the same course as the previous two. the only difference between this object and the other two was that this one was the colour of the setting sun and a large amount of sparks where coming from the rear, the movement of it was exactly the same as the other two. there was no sound whatsoever from any of these objects. i do not particulary look for objects in the sky although i have seen the usual man made things which have been identifiable. i also do not take drugs or drink!
